update policy
product_metadata_id = #{productMetadataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proposal_id = #{proposalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update policy set product_metadata_id = #{productMetadataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proposal_id = #{proposalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_id = #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, premium = #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, accepted_time = #{acceptedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, started_time = #{startedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ended_time = #{endedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_type = #{policyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openid_type = #{openidType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refer_id = #{referId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agency_id = #{agencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distributor_id = #{distributorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, promoter_id = #{promoterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coop_proposal_id = #{coopProposalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coop_proposal_id_seq = #{coopProposalIdSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handler_server = #{handlerServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_content = #{policyContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, request_content = #{requestContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, response_content = #{responseContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update policy set product_metadata_id = #{productMetadataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proposal_id = #{proposalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_id = #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, premium = #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, accepted_time = #{acceptedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, started_time = #{startedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ended_time = #{endedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_type = #{policyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openid_type = #{openidType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refer_id = #{referId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agency_id = #{agencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distributor_id = #{distributorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, promoter_id = #{promoterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coop_proposal_id = #{coopProposalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coop_proposal_id_seq = #{coopProposalIdSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handler_server = #{handlerServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select pop.*,fsd.rate,fsd.fee_strategy_detail_id,fs.fee_strategy_collect_type from (select policy_org.policy_id,policy_org.sku_id,policy_org.started_time,policy_org.agency_id, policy_org.premium,policy_org.job_id,orgin.org_id from (select p.policy_id,p.sku_id,p.started_time, p.premium,p.agency_id,ouj.job_id,orgi.org_path agency_org_path from policy p,org_user_job ouj,org_info orgi where p.agency_id = ouj.org_user_job_id and p.policy_id=#{policyId} and ouj.org_id = orgi.org_id ) policy_org, org_info orgin where policy_org.agency_org_path like CONCAT(orgin.org_path,'%') ) pop, sku_fee_strategy skufs,fee_strategy fs,fee_strategy_detail fsd where pop.sku_id = skufs.sku_id and pop.org_id = skufs.org_id and pop.job_id = fsd.job_id and fs.fee_strategy_id = skufs.fee_strategy_id and fs.fee_strategy_object='agency' and fs.fee_strategy_id = fsd.fee_strategy_id
